title: Whatever Happened To Romance?: A Modern Girls Quest For True Love, One Learning Experience At A Time
description: Whatever Happened To Romance? chronicles the real life dating mishaps of author K.T. Edwards as she searches for her Prince Charming- one questionable decision at a time.  When your twenties are spent in two states of mind: drunk and hungover. The path to meeting the one, can often be obstructed by lowered inhibitions, "learning experiences," and very bad men.  Whatever Happened To Romance? is a hilarious collection of true stories depicting exactly what it is like to be a modern-day single girl.  Anyone who has ever looked for love, or has finally found it, will be able to relate to this laugh out loud book!
author: K.T. Edwards
